item.title: Tree frog on leaf (© Tetsuya Tanooka/DEEPOL by plainpicture)
item.description: 图文来源自：bing. copyright: © Tetsuya Tanooka/DEEPOL by plainpicture In some parts of the world, the arrival of spring is announced by the guttural chorus of tree frogs. As their name suggests, these frogs spend most of their lives in trees. Belonging to species within the Neobatrachia suborder, it is characterised by its arboreal lifestyle, spending a significant portion of its life in trees. Despite their diverse origins within Neobatrachia, these tree-dwelling frogs share the common adaptation of inhabiting arboreal environments.
